About these notes

Automatically Expand URLs to Well-Titled Links

With this #recipe you can convert a link to a fully-formed Markdown link, using the pageâ€™s title as a display name. Useful for citations and creating link collections.

Required Extensions

  • Markdown Link Expander (not included in template)

Markdown Link Expander will scrape your URLâ€™s <title> tag to create a nice Markdown-style link.

Instructions

  1. Highlight desired URL
  2. Cmd + Shift + P
  3. Expand URL to Markdown
  4. Profit

Tip: If you paste a lot of links, give the action a custom key binding
